H2.text: Which Joan's career revived in Whatever Happened to Baby Jane. Blondell

H3.text: Which Joan's career revived in Whatever Happened to Baby Jane. Crawford

A4.text: The film was a huge success, recouping its costs within eleven days of its nationwide release and reviving Crawford's career.

A5.text: Crawford starred as Blanche Hudson, an elderly, disabled former A-list movie star who lives in fear of her psychotic sister Jane, in the highly successful psychological thriller What Ever Happened to Baby Jane? (1962).
